document_data.name: ''Waukeen's Curing Clasp''
document_data.creator: [[Church of Waukeen]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Waukeen's curing clasp''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[cloak]] clasp created by the [[Church of Waukeen]] of [[Ravens Bluff]] during the goddess's absence from the Realms.
document_data.Description: ''Waukeen's curing clasp'' was a finely-crafted [[coin]]-shaped clasp of pure [[gold]]. The front of the item was decorated with [[Waukeen]]'s profile.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of ''Waukeen's curing clasp'' could tap into the item's magic to heal themselves or other creatures. The clasp had a limited amount of healing it could produce per day.
